0.1.2.name: css-blank-pseudo
0.1.2.description: Style form elements when they are empty

scripts.build: npm run build:browser && npm run build:cli && npm run build:node && npm run build:postcss
scripts.build:browser: cross-env NODE_ENV=browser rollup -c .rollup.js --silent && cross-env NODE_ENV=browser:legacy rollup -c .rollup.js --silent
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:postcss
